mapper.select: SELECT b_body AS REVIEWBODY, b_date AS REVIEWTIME, p_placename AS PNAME FROM (SELECT b_body, b_date, oc_p_no FROM (SELECT b_body, b_date, b_t_no FROM board WHERE b_t_no = #{tno} AND b_isshow = 'Y' ORDER BY b_no), openclose WHERE oc_t_no = b_t_no AND to_date(oc_open,'YYYY/MM/DD') like to_date(b_date,'YYYY/MM/DD')), place WHERE rownum <= 10 AND p_no = oc_p_no ORDER BY b_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE b_t_no = #{tno} AND b_isshow = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum AS RNO, a.* FROM (SELECT b_body AS REVIEWBODY, b_date AS REVIEWTIME, p_placename AS PNAME FROM (SELECT b_body, b_date, oc_p_no FROM (SELECT b_body, b_date, b_t_no FROM board WHERE b_t_no = #{tno} AND b_isshow = 'Y' ORDER BY b_no), openclose WHERE oc_t_no = b_t_no AND to_date(oc_open,'YYYY/MM/DD') like to_date(b_date,'YYYY/MM/DD')), place WHERE rownum <= #{end} AND p_no = oc_p_no ORDER BY b_date DESC) a) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT m_name AS MNAME, round(ratio_to_report(sum(om_num)) over(partition by grouping_id(m_name))*100,2) as RATIO FROM menu, ordermenu WHERE m_t_no=#{tno} AND m_no=om_m_no GROUP BY m_name

SELECT WEEKNAME, round(ratio_to_report(sum(om_num*m_price)) over(partition by grouping_id(WEEKNAME))*100,2) as RATIO FROM (SELECT WEEKNAME, WEEKNUM, om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT o_no, o_t_no, to_char(o_ordtime,'DY') AS WEEKNAME, to_char(o_ordtime,'D') AS WEEKNUM FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno}), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no = m_no GROUP BY WEEKNAME, WEEKNUM ORDER BY WEEKNUM

SELECT o_gender AS GENDER, round(ratio_to_report(sum(om_num*m_price)) over(partition by grouping_id(o_gender))*100,2) as RATIO FROM (SELECT o_gender, om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT o_no, o_t_no, o_gender FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno}), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no = m_no GROUP BY o_gender

SELECT o_age AS AGE, round(ratio_to_report(sum(om_num*m_price)) over(partition by grouping_id(o_age))*100,2) as RATIO FROM (SELECT o_age, om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT o_no, o_t_no, o_age FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno}), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no = m_no GROUP BY o_age ORDER BY o_age

SELECT SALESUM, p_placename AS PNAME FROM (SELECT sum(m_price*om_num) AS SALESUM, oc_p_no FROM (SELECT om_m_no, om_num, oc_p_no FROM (SELECT o_no, o_t_no, oc_p_no FROM morder, openclose WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND o_t_no=oc_t_no AND to_date(o_ordtime,'YYYY/MM/DD')=to_date(oc_open,'YYYY/MM/DD')), ordermenu WHERE o_no = om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no GROUP BY oc_p_no ORDER BY oc_p_no), place WHERE p_no=oc_p_no

SELECT * FROM (SELECT to_char(o_ordtime,'MM/DD') AS SDATE, to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY') AS SYEAR, sum(MIDSUM) AS TOTALSUM FROM (SELECT o_ordtime, (m_price * om_num) AS MIDSUM FROM (SELECT o_ordtime, om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT o_no, o_ordtime FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND o_ordtime between (o_ordtime - 60) AND SYSDATE ), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no AND (to_char(o_ordtime,'MM/DD') between to_char((SYSDATE-60),'MM/DD') AND to_char(SYSDATE,'MM/DD'))), menu WHERE m_no=om_m_no) group by to_char(o_ordtime,'MM/DD'), to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY') order by to_char(o_ordtime,'MM/DD')) PIVOT (MAX(TOTALSUM) FOR SYEAR in('2015' s2015,'2016' s2016,'2017' s2017) ) ORDER BY SDATE

SELECT to_char(SYSDATE,'MM') AS YEARNAME, YEARSUM, YAVG, round(YEARSUM/YAVG*100) AS RATIO FROM (SELECT YEARSUM, YAVG FROM (SELECT sum(om_num * m_price) AS YEARSUM FROM (SELECT om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT o_no FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY') = to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no) , (SELECT round(avg(sum(om_num * m_price))) AS YAVG FROM (SELECT AYEAR, om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY') AS AYEAR, o_no FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY')<>to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY')), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no GROUP BY AYEAR))

SELECT to_char(SYSDATE,'MM') AS MONTHNAME, MONTHSUM, MAVG, round(MONTHSUM/MAVG*100) AS RATIO FROM (SELECT MONTHSUM, MAVG FROM (SELECT sum(om_num * m_price) AS MONTHSUM FROM (SELECT om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT o_no FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY/MM') = to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM')), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no) , (SELECT round(avg(sum(om_num * m_price))) AS MAVG FROM (SELECT AMONTH, om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY/MM') AS AMONTH, o_no FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY')<>to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AND to_char(o_ordtime,'MM')=to_char(SYSDATE,'MM')), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no GROUP BY AMONTH))

SELECT to_char(SYSDATE,'DD') AS DAYNAME, DAYSUM, DAVG, round(DAYSUM/DAVG*100) AS RATIO FROM (SELECT DAYSUM, DAVG FROM (SELECT sum(om_num * m_price) AS DAYSUM FROM (SELECT om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT o_no FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY/MM/DD') = to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no) , (SELECT round(avg(sum(om_num * m_price))) AS DAVG FROM (SELECT ADAY, om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS ADAY, o_no FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY')<>to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AND to_char(o_ordtime,'MM')<>to_char(SYSDATE,'MM') AND to_char(o_ordtime,'DD')=to_char(SYSDATE,'DD')), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no GROUP BY ADAY))

SELECT to_char(SYSDATE,'HH24') AS HOURNAME, HOURSUM, HAVG, round(HOURSUM/HAVG*100) AS RATIO FROM (SELECT HOURSUM, HAVG FROM (SELECT sum(om_num * m_price) AS HOURSUM FROM (SELECT om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT o_no FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY/MM/DD/HH24') = to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD/HH24')), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no) , (SELECT round(avg(sum(om_num * m_price))) AS HAVG FROM (SELECT AHOUR, om_m_no, om_num FROM (SELECT to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY/MM/DD/HH24') AS AHOUR, o_no FROM morder WHERE o_t_no=#{tno} AND to_char(o_ordtime,'YYYY')<>to_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY') AND to_char(o_ordtime,'MM')<>to_char(SYSDATE,'MM') AND to_char(o_ordtime,'DD')<>to_char(SYSDATE,'DD') AND to_char(o_ordtime,'HH24')=to_char(SYSDATE,'HH24')), ordermenu WHERE o_no=om_o_no), menu WHERE om_m_no=m_no GROUP BY AHOUR))
